mapper.select: SELECT DELIVERY_NUM, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) WHERE d.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT DELIVERY_NUM, DELIVERY_DATE, DELIVERY_CHECK, d.PRODUCT_ID, d.MEMBER_ID, p.product_name, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, m.member_name FROM delivery d join product p ON(d.product_id = p.product_id) join member m ON(d.member_id = m.member_id) WHERE DELIVERY_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND d.member_id = #{memberId}
